= Introduction =

How to write your smart search control declaration


= Details =

            <SmartSearch:SmartSearchCc x:Name="ss1"                                       
                                       Margin=" 2,0,1,0"                                         
                                       Grid.Column="1"                                       
                                       HorizontalAlignment="Stretch"									   
                                       Foreground="Black">
                <SmartSearch:SmartSearchScope DataControl="{Binding ElementName=executionStrategyBlotter}"   
                                              UnderlyingType="{x:Type Models:StrategyAdapter}">
                        <SmartSearch:PropertyFilter FieldName="SendTime" TextFormat="dd/MM HH:mm:ss.fff"/>
                        <SmartSearch:PropertyFilter FieldName="Product" />
                        <SmartSearch:PropertyFilter FieldName="Type" />
                        <SmartSearch:PropertyFilter FieldName="Direction" />
                        <SmartSearch:PropertyFilter FieldName="RequestedAmount" />
                        <SmartSearch:PropertyFilter FieldName="RequestedPrice" />
                        <SmartSearch:PropertyFilter FieldName="Amount" MonitorPropertyChanged="true"/>
                        <SmartSearch:PropertyFilter FieldName="Price" MonitorPropertyChanged="true"/>
                        <SmartSearch:PropertyFilter FieldName="AlgoName" />
                        <SmartSearch:PropertyFilter FieldName="UserRef" />
                        <SmartSearch:PropertyFilter FieldName="AlgoTypeName" />
                        <SmartSearch:PropertyFilter FieldName="Message" MonitorPropertyChanged="true"/>
                        <SmartSearch:PropertyFilter FieldName="Status" MonitorPropertyChanged="true"/>
                        <SmartSearch:PropertyFilter FieldName="Markets" />
                </SmartSearch:SmartSearchScope>
            </SmartSearch:SmartSearchCc>
